Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence
...Urghh...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、大丈夫か？ 具合が悪そうだが……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, are you all right? You don't look so good...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、大した事はない。 少し疲れを感じただけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: No, it's nothing. I'm just feeling a little tired.

Entry.JapaneseText: 珍しいな、<Eugene>が 疲れてるなんてさ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't hear that every day. I didn't even know you could get tired.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえたちのように 若くはないからな。 だが、心配は無用だ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, I'm not as young as the rest of you. But don't worry, I'm fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に大丈夫？ 少し休もうよ。 ボクも歩き疲れてヘトヘトだし。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you sure you're okay? Let's take a little break. I'm pretty worn out too, from all the walking we've been doing.

Entry.JapaneseText: それがよさそうね。 宿屋へ行きましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: That doesn't sound like a bad idea. Let's head over to the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: 見て見て！ この雪だるま、 ボクが作ったんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Look, look! I made this snowman!

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンの雪だるまは みーんな角が生えてるけど、 ガジュマじゃないんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: In Nolzen, everyone puts horns on their snowmen, but they aren't Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔、ハーフさんっていう人が この辺に住んでて、その人を マネして作ったんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: A long time ago, it's said that a Half lived around here, and people started making snowmen in their likeness.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちの小さい雪だるまは 去年、ボクが作ったんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I made that small snowman over there last year.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの裏庭には、 お父さんが子供の頃に作った 昔の雪だるまもあるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: And in our backyard, there's a snowman that my father made a long time ago when he was a child.

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンは一年中寒くて、 雪が降ってるから、雪だるまは あんまり溶けないんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Since Nolzen is frozen all year long and it's always snowing, the snowmen don't melt very often.

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉さん……ボクさ…… お姉さんにボクの雪だるま…… プレゼントするよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey miss... I...made you a snowman...as a present...

Entry.JapaneseText: だからさ……えっとさ…… 大きくなったらさ、ボクとさ…… けっこん……してくれる？
Entry.EnglishText: So...um...when I grow up... Will you marry me?

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉さんって、キレイだね。 ウチのお母さんみたい。
Entry.EnglishText: You're very pretty. You remind me of my mom.

Entry.JapaneseText: お兄さんたち、カッコイイね！ ボクもお兄さんたちみたいに なりたいなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: You guys are so cool! I wanna be like you...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが悪いから お父さんは一緒に 遊んでくれないんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: My dad won't let me play with Gajuma because they are bad!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじさん、悪い事するの やめてね！
Entry.EnglishText: So don't do any bad things!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近さ、お父さんがあんまり 遊んでくれないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: My dad hasn't been letting me play lately...

Entry.JapaneseText: 全部ガジュマが悪いんだって…… ボク、だから、ガジュマの事、 嫌いになってきちゃった……
Entry.EnglishText: He says that all Gajuma are bad... So I started to hate Gajuma too...

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、この地鳴りで雪だるま、 崩れたりしないかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I-Is this earthquake going to knock over my snowmen?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、バイラスを倒してくれた 兵士さんのゆきだるまを 作るんだぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I made a snowman of the soldier who defeated the Biruses.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクも漆黒軍団に入ったんだ！ だから、今度、漆黒のゆきだるまを 作るんだぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I joined the Dark Callegean Soldiers! So I'm going to make a Dark Snowman.

Entry.JapaneseText: 寒い？ でも今日は、 あったかいくらいだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're cold? But it's so warm out today.

Entry.JapaneseText: この少年と約束したんです。 この街も、ゆきだるまも 守ってみせると……
Entry.EnglishText: I made a promise to this boy that I would protect this town and the snowmen in it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 隊長も がんばってください！
Entry.EnglishText: You do your best as well, Commander!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… おまえも無理はするなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Will do... Don't work too hard, now.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい！
Entry.EnglishText: Yessir!

Entry.JapaneseText: みなさんも がんばってください！
Entry.EnglishText: Keep up the good work!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
